monster.name: Kobold
monster.environment: Arctic, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Hill, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark, Urban

trait.name: Source
trait.text: Monster Manual, p. 195

trait.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action on the kobold turn, the kobold can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of the kobold next turn, kobold's allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of kobold that can see him.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

monster.description: Kobold's are craven reptilian humanoids that commonly infest dungeons. They make up for their physical ineptitude with a cleverness for trap making.

monster.name: Kobold Tribal Warrior
monster.environment: Arctic, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Hill, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark, Urban

trait.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action on the kobold turn, the kobold can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of the kobold next turn, kobold's allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of kobold that can see him.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Spear
action.text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

monster.description: Tribal warriors live beyond civilization, most often subsisting on fishing and hunting. Each tribe acts in accordance with the wishes of its chief, who is the greatest or oldest warrior of the tribe or a tribe member blessed by the gods.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
trait.text: The kobold has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action on the kobold turn, the kobold can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of the kobold next turn, kobold's allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of kobold that can see him.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Pick or Hammer (Scimitar)
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing or bludgeoning damage.

monster.name: Mod of Kobold
monster.immune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned
monster.environment: Arctic, Coastal, Desert, Forest, Hill, Mountain, Swamp, Underdark, Urban

trait.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg (1/Day)
trait.text: As an action on the kobold turn, the kobold can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of the kobold next turn, kobold's allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of kobold that can see him.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
trait.text: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Swarm
trait.text: The kobold's can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the kobold's can move through any opening large enough for a Small kobold. The kobold's can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the kobold's space. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage, or 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage if the kobold's has half of its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target in the kobold's space. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage if the kobold's has half of its hit points or fewer.

monster.name: Mod of Kobold
monster.immune: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
trait.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the kobold's space. Hit: 36 (8d4 + 16) piercing damage, or 26 (4d4 + 16) piercing damage if the kobold's has half of its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Sling
action.text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target in the kobold's space. Hit: 36 (8d4 + 16) bludgeoning damage, or 26 (4d4 + 16) bludgeoning damage if the kobold's has half of its hit points or fewer.

action.name: Dagger
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the kobold's space. Hit: 144 (32d4 + 64) piercing damage, or 104 (16d4 + 64) piercing damage if the kobold's has half of its hit points or fewer.
